title: Pentagalloyl glucose targets the JAK1/JAK3-STAT3 pathway to inhibit cancer stem cells and epithelial-mesenchymal transition in 5-fluorouracil-resistant colorectal cancer.
abstract: Colorectal cancer (CRC) resistance to 5-fluorouracil (5-FU), primarily driven by cancer stem cells (CSCs) and epithelial-mesenchymal transition (EMT), remains a major clinical challenge, necessitating novel therapeutic strategies.
journal: Phytomedicine : international journal of phytotherapy and phytopharmacology
